archiefmat.titel: "Concept hoe en op wat manier men (in Suriname) met een commando of detachement bestaande uit 200 man reguliere troupen en 50 man van 't corps vrijnegers in de boschen ... zoude kunnen ageeren ..."
archiefmat.titel_eng: "Concept of a plan regarding the way in which a unit consisting of 200 regular troops and 50 men from the corps of the free blacks could operate in the woods (of Suriname) ..."
archiefmat.notes: Undated; 18th century. See also the Collection of maps Leupe, first part (inv.no. 4. VEL), nos. 2132 and 2133 and inv.no. 1.05.03, no. 364 (Society of Suriname, Letters and papers received by the Governor).
